comments:
Eclipse 3.2 M5 + Mylar 0.4.9:

I'm not sure about what exactly triggers this bug, I was working with Active Search view opened, and a dozen Error Log message boxes started to popup in my screen. I figured out that every time I closed and reopened the Active Search view, this bug happened.

I was unable to reproduce this in a clean installation.

The exception is:

Fixed.  A work-around for 0.4.9 is set the XML degrees of separation to 0 (i.e. disable it).

A fix will be in next week's dev build, but let me know if you would like one sooner.
Thanks, I will use the workaround and wait for the next dev build.
